body:

replies.body: You might want to improve on your English as well a bit buddy

To readjust your sentence so it makes a little more sense - "I just had a game with this guy and his behaviour **was horrible/appalling ** (you don't say "impressed me badly" that doesn't work, impressed is used like "That was impressive" meaning "That was good/great" or "You impressed me" meaning "You surprised me").  There are still players that can be so aggressive and racist like this?"

Note: Horrible/appalling means "Bad" or "Not good"
